text: The novel of a seamstress (also known as La lettura or Il romanzo di una cucitrice) is a 20th-century late filippinism painted in oil by Umberto Boccioni. It was painted about 1908, in Milano, Italy. Umberto Boccioni was inspired by these art work by Filippini painting "Reading". File:Filippini, La Lettura, Madame Bovary, 1881, Olio su tela, 60 x 68 cm.jpg|Francesco Filippini, Reading 1981 File:Umberto Boccioni, La lettura, 1908, Museo Palazzo Arnone.jpg|Umberto Boccioni, La lettura 1908, Museo Palazzo Arnone File:Umberto Boccioni, La lettura, 1908, 17x12 cm.jpg|Umberto Boccioni, La lettura, 17x12 cm 1908 File:Umberto Boccioni, Maria Sacchi legge.jpg|Umberto Boccioni, Maria Sacchi legge File:Umberto Boccioni, Reading woman, 1909, 42x30.6 cm.jpg|Umberto Boccioni, Reading woman, 42x30.6 cm 1909 File:Umberto Boccioni, Ines che legge, 1907, cm. 15 x 8.jpg|Umberto Boccioni, Reading woman, 15x8 cm 1907 File:Umberto boccioni, donna in giardino, 1907.jpg|Umberto Boccioni, Woman in the garden 1907 == Related pages == * Reading (Filippini) * Portrait of the mother (Boccioni) * Francesco Filippini == Bibliography == * Francesco Filippini, un protagonista del Naturalismo, Ed. title: The novel of a seamstress
